title: Vaccines: Are They Really Safe and Effective?
description: A parent's guide to understanding immunizations. This comprehensive book includes 12 diagrams and over 300 citations, fully documented. Learn to make concerned, responsible decisions regarding risks and benefits of vaccinations. Updated version including information on smallpox, anthrax and the flu vaccines.Paperback 7
cleaned_text: A parent's guide to understanding immunizations. This comprehensive book includes 12 diagrams and over 300 citations, fully documented. Learn to make concerned, responsible decisions regarding risks and benefits of vaccinations. Updated version including information on smallpox, anthrax and the flu vaccines.
